body.name: [Pack Of 50] Black Disposable Face Mask, 3-Ply Adult Masks, Facial Cover with Elastic Earloops For Home, Office, School, and Outdoors

features: QUALITY PRODUCT: The Face Masks are gentle on the skin and feel comfortable and easy to put on and take off, Our high-quality filtering face masks ensure a physical barrier to smoke, droplets, dirt, dust and powder, It can help block pollution so you can breathe easily and safely in any environment, they are disposable so you don’t have to worry about washing or storing them.

FLEXIBLE AND COMFORTABLE: These disposable masks are designed to be lightweight and breathable, With the feature of unfolding and expanding, the face masks will ensure full coverage of your nose and mouth, while the soft elastic ear loops will not cause discomfort or irritation, Just slip the elastic bands over your ears and press the metal strip around the bridge of your nose to create a light seal around your face.
WIDELY USABLE: Breathable Non-Woven Mouth Cover for Personal, Suitable for Home, Office, Outdoor and other public places such as Commuting, Gardening, Short trips, Driving, Sports, and Outdoors.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Your safety and health are our Concerns, Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions. We will do whatever is necessary to resolve your problem to ensure you get the best shopping experience.
This mask is not intended for medical use, and not proven to reduce the transmission of disease
body.description: Actual Details Of Our Gleeporte MasksGleeporte provides you with high-quality masks, our protective disposable face masks are made in a clean production environment, and consistent quality is embedded in our production process.Water-resistantHydrophobic layer to effectively stop particles and droplets3-PLY MaskOur masks are manufactured with 3 layers of protectionNose StripEach mask is designed with an adjustable strip to perfectly fit your noseElastic Bandthe elastic straps will fit the mask around your ear for a comfortable experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and effective product
reviews.reviewText: I offer these to my staff and even customers that request a mask . They are a comfortable fit and serve their purpose well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great to have around the house!
reviews.reviewText: These are great to have on hand for when you feel a bit of a cold or know you're traveling in a highly congested area and want to take that extra precaution. They are also nice to have around in case a guest needs one. I have a few hanging on a coat rack by my door.They are comfortable and lightweight. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective and Painless Black Mask
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the black mask, and I'm impressed with the results. The mask effectively removed impurities and left my skin feeling refreshed. Unlike other masks, it didn't cause any discomfort during application or removal. A little goes a long way, making it a cost-effective choice. Overall, a great addition to my skincare routine!ConsWhile the black mask I purchased had positive aspects, there were a couple of drawbacks. Firstly, the strong scent upon application might be overwhelming for some users with sensitivity to fragrances. Additionally, the peeling process, though effective, required a bit of patience and precision to avoid any discomfort. Overall, these cons are worth considering alongside the mask's benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Masks that fit.
reviews.reviewText: Prior to ordering these, I'd ordered masks from a different supplier. They didn't fit properly - which is dangerous. I ended up using far more than necessary as well due to the poor fit (they'd slip) and the lesser quality had me doubling up in certain settings. These masks, that I'm now rating, are of noticeably higher quality - they grip the nose well, which greatly helps with keeping them in place, and are far more comfortable than the ones prior. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can get a better price anywhere else, and it is difficult to get the black mask anywhere else so purchasing through Amazon was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish And good material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not well made
reviews.reviewText: These masks don't hold up well. I am required to wear a mask all day at work, and these tend to break down on the sides where the pleating is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They have good quality material. I'm glad they don't smell weird or like chemicals as others I used before and I appreciate the loops don't pressure behind my ears like others. Thank you

reviews.reviewTitle: Very thin. Not the box advertised.
reviews.reviewText: I give a 3 star on receiving the product, but will update if needed. They are very thin and material feels rough. Reading reviews it is apparent that products made in China change regularly with no regard for quality control. On May 9th, 2022 I received very thin masks with black on both sides. I prefer a white back so you know which is front and back. Some people complain about the pleats being upside down. That only applies if there is a definite front and back. If both sides are the same, you just turn the mask over. Ear loops are round so they may be uncomfortable? After using for a while I will know if the ear loops are ok, and whether the mask is rough or leaves fuzz. There is a slight odor when you first put them on. Overall this product is not reliable as it seems to vary regularly according to the reviews, so a buyer has no idea what they will really receive. Can Amazon not find masks made in a country who believes in quality control?
